text: Our company has not undertaken split or consolidation of its equity shares in the one year preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring prospectus
R. **EXEMPTION FROM COMPLYING WITH ANY PROVISIONS OF SECURITIES LAWS, IF ANY, GRANTED BY SEBI:**
Our Company has not applied or received any exemptions from SEBI from complying with any provisions of securities laws, as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
